headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TTO Creator Marketplace accounts. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: tto_tcm_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TTO Creator Marketplace account. To obtain the IDs of the accounts that you can access via Access-Token , use /tto/oauth2/tcm/ .

parameters.name: handle_names
parameters.description: The handle names of TikTok Creators. Max size: 20.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Information .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: onboarding_status
fields.description: The onboarding status data for Creators.

fields.name: handle_name
fields.description: The handle name that was checked.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The onboarding status of the Creator. Enum values: IN : The Creator has joined TTO Creator Marketplace. NOT_IN : The Creator has not joined TTO Creator Marketplace. INVALID : The specified handle name ( handle_name ) is invalid.
